item.title: Fixing date on exported videos from Apple's Photos
item.description: I have been dealing with an annoying problem when using the app Photos on Mac OS. I sort my photos and videos by years and Photos has a nice feature to create “smart albums” where you can sort the content by different criteria like “file name contains…” and things like that. At the end of the year, I make an export of all the content for the last year and store it as an archive in a remote hard drive in case Photos stops working, or I have to reset the computer or something, so I don’t loose the photos and videos.
